campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 18th Kickstarter, and there are some vagaries in terms of timing when it comes to anything produced in China, such as: 
Production delays 
Shipping delays 
Customs delays

The estimated delivery date is December 2015, but keep in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

We've done our best to minimize this as much as possible, and we are always happy to refund pledges if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered at all. Since the game is 90% complete, we don't believe this is in the least bit likely. We've successfully delivered Zombicide, Sedition Wars, Guilds of Cadwallon, Zombicide Season 2, Relic Knights, Rivet Wars, Kaosball, Dogs of War, Arcadia Quest, Wrath of Kings, and XenoShyft. Zombicide Season 3 has been fully sent out and being delivered to the last backers, and we are in the process of delivering our Base System and The World of Smog: On Her Majesty's Service.

We have three ongoing projects currently: Rum & Bones which is in the final stages of production, Blood Rage which is well advanced, and B-Sieged which is starting production.

Please refer to our individual project pages if you'd like to check the progress there. Each project is entirely independent of each other and have completely different development teams and have no effect on the production flow or development of Zombicide: Black Plague.

REFUND POLICY

We can refund you within 60 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 60 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment (usually 4 to 6 weeks before the actual shipping date), no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 60 days close of the campaign are processed via Paypal only. Refunds within 60 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed. 

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

If you do not log in and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, we will treat it as abandoned and will refund or ship on a case by case basis.

By pledging to this Kickstarter, you acknowledge that the final look, materials and content of the rewards (and the Kickstarter) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project is active. You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the general release.

campaign.story:
B-Sieged: Sons of the Abyss is a fully cooperative castle defense board game that combines exciting combat action with classic resource management. In this thrilling defensive battle, 1 to 6 players control the mighty Heroes of Modhelm, who must fight back the encroaching Abyssal hordes, and endure until salvation arrives!
Find out more about the Zombicide: Black Plague ID cards here!
B-Sieged comes with 70 highly detailed, pre-assembled miniatures including 6 Heroes and the unstoppable hordes of the Abyss. Each player takes control of a number of Heroes while the encroaching Abyssal forces are controlled by the game itself.
The mighty Heroes of Modhelm: Orobox, Lugh & Eileen
The mighty Heroes of Modhelm: Myrinia, Osvith & Kador
The relentless Krohn & the Elite Krohn
The overwhelming Gargoh, the gigantic Mölen and Elite Gargoh
Visit the B-Sieged’s Facebook page for more pictures, insight, and news on the game!
In B-Sieged, players must cooperate to defend the Citadel of Modhelm. Dark forces have surrounded the city and the entire realm will drown in flames if the Abyssal Hordes aren’t stopped! The Council has tasked the Messenger with escaping the siege to retrieve an ancient magic artifact that will break the enemy forces. The Citadel must endure the onslaught until the Messenger returns, and it’s the Heroes’ task to keep the Messenger safe and defend the Citadel.
The Citadel of Modhelm and the adjoining Enemy Fields
During their turn, Heroes may take 3 actions. They can spend these actions to visit the various buildings inside the Citadel to get resources (such as Food, Gold, Special Abilities, and Cards), repair damaged buildings, trade cards, fight Enemies from the walls, or try to use the powerful catapult at the center of the Citadel. The Heroes must coordinate their actions well to share resources, gather vital supplies, and survive the siege.
After the Heroes have acted, it’s the Monsters' turn. Each monster figure on the board will activate and perform their actions according to its rank. Mölens, the Heavy Units, will attack directly from Zone 3 and damage all Heroes and buildings in the Quarter they face. Gargohs, the Support Units, will advance towards Zone 2 and, once there, they’ll hit all Heroes in the Quarter they face. The Assault Units, the Krohns, will advance towards Zone 1, and once there, they’ll attack the Heroes on the wall and try to break into the Citadel.
Experience the thrilling siege of Modhelm in this fantastic, action-packed board game from Cool Mini or Not and Second Gate Games!

Risks and challenges
This is our 17th Kickstarter, and there are some vagaries in terms of timing when it comes to anything produced in China, such as:
Production delays 
Shipping delays 
Customs delays

The estimated delivery date is November 2015, but keep in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

We've done our best to minimize this as much as possible, and we are always happy to refund pledges if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered at all. Since the game is 90% complete, we don't believe this is in the least bit likely - we've successfully delivered Zombicide, Sedition Wars, Guilds of Cadwallon, Zombicide Season 2, Relic Knights, Rivet Wars, Kaosball, Dogs of War, Arcadia Quest, Wrath of Kings and XenoShyft. We are in the final stages of delivery for Zombicide Season 3.

We have four ongoing projects currently: our Base System and The World of Smog: On Her Majesty's Service which are in the final stages of production, Rum & Bones, and Blood Rage.

Please refer to our individual project pages if you'd like to check the progress there. Each project is entirely independent of each other and have completely different development teams and have no effect on the production flow or development of B-Sieged.

REFUND POLICY

We can refund you within 60 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 60 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment (usually 4 to 6 weeks before the actual shipping date), no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 60 days close of the campaign are processed via Paypal only. Within 60 days refunds are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.

campaign.story:
Myth is a cooperative game for 2 to 5 players developed and published by MegaCon Games. Blackwall Warrens and the Shores of Kanis expand and update the world of Myth with Journeyman Heroes, terrifying new monsters, exciting new weapons and armor sets, and a revised rule set and cards. 
Here's a look at everything you've unlocked so far!
                            Click the link below to learn how to play Myth.
The kingdom of the Okian lies at the heart of sun-scorched Kanis. It is a sand-blasted land where massive stone monuments rise to honor the dark master Anunkara, Keeper of the Dead.
Under the sprawling ruins of the once great trading city of Blackwall lies the Knot. The maze of tunnels house uncounted evils. In the deep dark of the warrens courage is tested and fear takes hold.
What is NEW!
There is a lot of new. 
5 "light" Journeyman Hero decks (Shores of Kanis)
5 "dark" Journeyman Hero decks (Blackwall Warrens)
New Heroes: Swashbuckler and the Outsider
Commander class monsters
New Bosses, Mini-bosses, Captains, and Minions
Orange tier weapons and gear
Gold tier armor sets
Dual wielding
Malice pool
Myth Module System
New realm tiles
New traps
New titles
Capture and Interrogate rules
Bar Fight alternate game mode
What is UPDATED.
2nd Edition rules  
All base game Hero cards
All KS exclusive Hero and item cards (Trickster, Skald, Spriggan) 
All base game item cards 
Trap deck
Over the last year, we've been able to focus on the Myth base game. We've updated the rules, which you can download below. They are more streamlined and function like more traditional board game rule books. 
The entire run of Hero and item cards has been revised for clarity and amended using keywords. These have been released for some time through the Myth patch system on our website and have already been played with and tested by hundreds of players.
The trap system has been completely overhauled. Traps are more straightforward and deck based, with setup images and explanation on each card. Furthermore, any trap can be used on any realm tile. 
Finally, we've made a clear distinction between story quests—now expanded and renamed in the form of Myth modules—and the much more robust, free-form questing, referred to as Adventuring.
Myth Modules vs. Adventuring
The Myth quest system has been re-imagined. The overlapping story and free-form questing nature of the base game has been overhauled. We’ve separated them completely into two modes: Modules and Adventuring.
Modules are greatly expanded, lore-filled story quests. Everything for setup has been provided and explained. Players in modules ignore realm tile legends. Setup is as easy as placing the minis and objects where the images indicate.
Furthermore, modules have a larger story and expand the lore of Myth. They place you in the world and immerse you with the history and richness of the events taking place. Narrated sections of the module are read by a participant, yet the game remains fully cooperative.
Free-form questing is now referred to as adventuring. While adventuring, players utilize the legends on the realm tiles and populate their quest per the quest cards. However, the adventuring system provides room for the discovery of Bosses and the earning of titles.
The new monster classification, Commanders, are key here. Commanders make those monsters under them exceedingly more difficult. Commanders can also be captured and interrogated by the Heroes to find a Boss’ lair. Most importantly, these two modes of play are now completely separate. There is no crossover. Myth is either played by using a module or by adventuring—never both.
Heroes
The two new Heroes that come in the expansions are the Swashbuckler (Shores of Kanis) and the Outsider (Blackwall Warrens). Like the other Myth Heroes, they have unique play styles and offer their own set of challenges. Each new expansion Hero also has their journeyman deck upgrades included in their box.
The Swashbuckler is a pure dual wielder and only follows the light path. He consistently has the capacity to activate his secondary weapon and the extra Fate Dice to trigger that weapon's power. Additionally, he is much more at home in danger, surrounded by a host of monsters or facing off one-on-one with a boss. He is an absolute blast to play. 
The Outsider utilizes the Malice system and only follows the dark path. When Heroes take advantage of the Darkness and strike out of revenge, Malice is generated. This Malice finds its way into a pool that only certain Heroes can access. The Outsider may choose to make a played card more powerful by utilizing Malice to supplement it as defined by the card. Additionally, the Outsider is very good at manipulating the Darkness meter to his own nefarious purposes.   
Beyond the new Heroes, each expansion provides players with the means to upgrade their existing Heroes from Novice to Journeyman. Journeyman Heroes have made a choice: to follow the light or listen to the whispers of the Darkness. 
The light Journeyman Heroes are found in the Shores of Kanis. The dark Journeyman Heroes are found in Blackwall Warrens. 
Look for updates that detail the Journeyman Heroes.
Shipping information - Please take note  
Based on our experience with Myth, we will be charging shipping after the Kickstarter ends. This cost will be based on the actual costs incurred to ship. We will collect this via our pledge manager after the campaign concludes.  
This charge will be calculated by our shipping partner with maximum discounts applied. 
Simply put, shipping costs change considerably in the months between a KS end and the actual shipping date. Estimating future costs in the present is impossible, and not being flexible enough to recoup skyrocketing shipping costs is not economically feasible for us anymore.
Additionally, MegaCon Games will be responsible for shipping a backer's reward ONCE to the address on file. If the backer has not taken the responsibility to update his or her address, or does not claim the package in the time provided, then reshipping the item will be done so at additional expense to the backer.

We do love a good Dungeon Boardgame or Fantasy RPG! It's great fun exploring dungeons with friends or family, playing an engaging narrative and taking a welcome journey into a magical world of heroes and adventure!
But often, something ruins the immersive experience with these games. Its the one aspect which is always overlooked by game publishers. It's like its an afterthought with the big games companies, tacked on the end of a release with some cheap tokens or flimsy card terrain.
Real Dungeon Scenery has been forgotten for long enough!
If you are the kind of gamer who wants an engaging and immersive environment when you play your favorite games. If you want detailed scenery and a wide range of characterful terrain for your heroes to interact with and explore. And if you want to really impress players, with a rich and visually impressive game. Then this Kickstarter, was made for you!
We aim to produce detailed scenery and characterful dungeon terrain for the gaming world. Based around an "inch square" system, the terrain is compatible with a whole array of boardgames and RPG games such as Dungeons and Dragons™, Heroquest™, Dwarven Forge Terrain™ and essentially anything using 28mm-30mm scale character miniatures.
Cast in quality Resin for maximum detail. No odd materials, no "restic" - just RESIN, the tried and tested, gamer's material of choice for decades!
With this terrain, we offer you the tools to forge your own narratives. Create amazing furnished dungeon chambers, which will keep players engaged and always guessing what is in store, from one game to the next.

Risks and challenges
We aim to produce a new range of resin dungeon miniatures. The risks to this project are very minimal. We do this kind of model design, prototyping, mouldmaking and casting, every day. And have been doing so for 5 years, as a small company. 

Now, things are looking like it is time to expand. I have quit my full time day-job to run Zealot. And this is our chance to grow the range and put Zealot on the miniatures map!

For this project, the digital sculpting, 3d printing of prototypes and casting, all happens in-house. There are no delays or problems caused by outsourcing every stage to another company and trying to slot into their schedule. The only exception, is the production of the plastic dungeon floor and wall tiles (stretch goal), which will be outsourced to an experienced injection moulder.

Risk#1: Resin speed of manufacture. 
Resin is a labor intensive material to cast with. Casting 30 units or casting 3000 units, its the same amount of time and work to produce each unit. That's why we have staggered the release dates on some pledges ("Early Pledges"), to accommodate for this to some degree. 
If the project is particularly successful, then this may overstretch our current capacity. In the event of this looking likely, we will expand production with new staff and equipment. 
In the event of a extremely successful funding period, we can outsource any stage of production to our trusted long term business contacts. 

That is about all the foreseen risks to this project. As mentioned before, this kind of miniature creation is what we have been doing for years. There is nothing out of the ordinary workflow. Everything will be produced to our usual high standard.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our second Kickstarter campaign, the first being our Sci-fi terrain which was successfully funded, manufactured and shipped to our backers.

We already know exactly what's involved in producing this product and we will be using the same manufacturers and suppliers. As we design and make the terrain ourselves we already have a working prototype and this has been play tested as was our Sci-fi range.

We know how much it will cost, how long it will take to produce and how much delivery will cost in both time and money.

We have taken into account delays and problems in manufacturing and have given the time-scale as a worse case scenario so many customers should get their goods ahead of schedule. Issues can always arise and we are ready for them should anything go wrong.

The final product may vary slightly from our prototypes in look and quantity. As with our Sci-fi terrain we are pushing the manufacturing process to its limits and there may be some components that need adjustment and certain quantities may need to be re-assessed if there are problems at the manufacturing stage. Having said that we had no issues in either look or quantity with our last project :o)

We are ready to run and we just need your help to get this new range started. If we get stuck we will work through it to deliver you the best product possible, not a half baked compromise. We are gamers and absolutely love what we do so we want you to get what we have envisioned.

Just in case you still don't know what we do... Watch this:
This project is not just about making Bitter Ruin's next album, it's about elevating the album to the next level. A level where our music can shine as brightly as any professional recording. A level that will open new doors to Bitter Ruin, changing us from an unsigned band into an independent entity with a buzzing nervous system and the competitive production skills that control a creative heart, allowing it to pump the blood, our music, back into the organs that keep us alive - YOU! We want Bitter Ruin to be heard on an equal platform. We want to stand up next to the mainstream chart, but with something different, something real, and we hope you'd like to see this too?
Think Queen. Think Bowie. Think Bjork...Think Bitter Ruin?
You are the ones who will be able to say "We helped." "We were there." And we WANT your involvement. Please believe that we appreciate this involvement whether it be a pledge, donation or simply your support.
The plan: build a pro home studio and record our next album to a professional standard. We have always admired the production on mainstream albums; the instrumentation, the vastness, the quality of sound. BUT we feel that there's something equally special about those songs that have been recorded in a bedroom, and yet still make your heart beat faster than any overproduced no1 hit single. We know that some of the best albums we've ever heard were recorded in someone's garage, or wardrobe or special retreat. A place where the artist can choose to relax when they need or to energize when inspiration strikes. A place where the artist feels comfortable enough to try that new 'really weird song' that might just end up being the next Bohemian Rhapsody!
So we want to build a studio that will compete with mainstream quality, but in a place where we can take creative control. Home.
Where do you come in? Frustratingly, our forthcoming album has been waiting to be recorded for over a year now. We need your help to finish it. We're asking you to help us raise £20,000 or more in order to finish building our studio, to record the album (actually TWO albums), then professionally manufacture and promote it.
But why don't we just spend the money on hiring a good studio? Believe it or not, building our own studio is going to be cheaper than hiring one and most desirably it gives us TIME. We want to spend every waking hour of every day for the next two months making this album a perfect vision in our eyes. We don't want to feel restricted by a certain studio's facilities, engineer's capabilities or producer's passion. WE NEED TO SELF-PRODUCE THIS. We want this to be OUR album, to create a true representation of who we are! If you love what we've done so far and you love our live shows WE PROMISE YOU, THIS WILL BEAT IT.
We have crafted some beautiful "RUIN REWARDS" to suit our beautiful fans "The Ruined". These are the type of gifts and experiences that on most occasions money cannot buy!!! But we've tried to make them affordable and appealing to you. If you're interested to learn more about each reward please take the time to look at the blogs and vlogs, facebook and twitter page. Here's a sneak peek at the luxurious "LONDON LISTENING PARTY" Venue:
The Gorgeous Listening Party Venue
And a photo of a 'MEMORY DECK' prototype!
Memory Deck Prototype
Please note:
SO...
This is a once in a lifetime opportunity for us to really push the band. A studio would be an incredible asset to add to the Bitter Ruin HQ that will allow us to make music more efficiently, more professionally and more creatively. We'll be able to bring new music to you faster and cheaper. This will allow the recording of all future albums to be less expensive meaning that we'll be able to pour more funds into things like tours, music videos, session musicians, special merchandise, costumes and album art.
We will for the first time be able to put money into a professional and extensive PR campaign.
Bitter Ruin has been fortunate enough to receive crucial help from many volunteers, and as much as we try to pay everyone, much of our business relies on their free time. Your pledges will enable us to start paying these people fairly. 
Mostly, we will be able to make the album that has been scratching away at our innards for the last year. THIS PROJECT WILL FULFIL A LIFELONG DREAM.
Firstly we hope that you will find huge satisfaction in helping to fund this project, but you will also benefit by receiving more of our music, more of our art and some rewards that are absolutely exclusive to backers of this project. You are invited to join this community and will instantly be offered benefits and rewards that no one will ever have access to again. You will also share our benefits by seeing better concerts with more musicians, in better venues with better sound and lighting. You will hear our music come to life when recorded in better quality, and you have the chance to get up close and personal with us, like you never have before. We want to thank you!
We love you all, you know that right? Well, we do. We're very nervous. We hope this works.
Lots of love Ben & Georgia
P.S. Estimated release date will be September 2013...keep reading for cost breakdown and FAQs...and here's an example of "ART BY GEORGIA" just in case you want to get an idea of size, style and quality.
...and a reminder of those costumes we mention in the "UP CLOSE AND PERSONAL BUNDLE"...
Please ask us any questions you may have with regards to bundles and remember IF YOU DON'T SEE YOUR PERFECT BUNDLE, say for example you want a combination of two bundles and you can't find it? EASY, all you have to do is email sales@bitterruin.com and we will sort out a separate payment that doesn't mean doubling up!
